entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0204.10705] The concept us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense with a value of 2,900,000 has been used with the axis FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis and the member us-gaap:SoftwareDevelopmentMember. The member us-gaap:SoftwareDevelopmentMember should not be used with the FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis hs it is expected to represent a tangible asset. Please change the member to represent an intangible asset or change the axis to represent a tangible asset. i.e. PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis.
Concept : us-gaap:AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense Value : 2,900,000 Period : 2023-08-01 to 2023-10-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis=us-gaap:SoftwareDevelopmentMember
Rule Element Id:10705 Rule version: 27.0.0RC1 - zs-20241031.htm 8

The member us-gaap:SoftwareDevelopmentMember should not be used with the FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsByMajorClassAxis hs it is expected to represent a tangible asset. Please change the member to represent an intangible asset or change the axis to represent a tangible asset. i.e. PropertyPlantAndEquipmentByTypeAxis.
